sentences.en: " Adversity is the midwife of genius. "
"You're doing really well," her midwife said encouragingly.
Betty is the midwife of Jim.

sentences.cn: 达伦的女朋友是个助产士.

sentences.en: Have you considered using a midwife to deliver your baby naturally?
sentences.cn: 你曾考虑过找助产士来帮助你自然接生 吗 ?

sentences.en: She is a well - known parturition hastening midwife.
sentences.cn: 她是这一带有名的催生婆.

sentences.en: Tell your midwife what you want so she can make a note of it and avoid misunderstandings.
sentences.cn: 把你的要求告诉助产士，这样她可以记下来，避免产生误解。

sentences.en: The midwife cut and tied off the baby's umbilical cord.
sentences.cn: 助产士剪断婴儿的脐带并将它结扎.
那位助产护士给她妹妹接生.

sentences.en: The midwife gave him a warm bath.
sentences.cn: 助产士给他洗了个热水澡。

sentences.en: Two of his men assisted the midwife and the baby was born.
sentences.cn: 他的两个雇工协助接生员,于是孩子就出生了.

sentences.en: Washington's efforts to midwife a Mideast settlement ( Newsweek )
sentences.cn: 华盛顿方面努力促成中东问题的解决 ( 新闻周刊 )

sentences.en: With the help of the midwife, the baby was born successfully.
sentences.cn: 在助产士的帮助下, 胎儿顺利地降生了.

sentences.en: Xiangzi, Joy and the midwife watched over her for three days and three nights.
sentences.cn: 祥子, 小福子,收生婆,连着守了她三天三夜.

sentences.en: You don't have to call the midwife as soon as labour starts.
sentences.cn: 你不必刚开始分娩就叫助产士。

sentences.en: Your doctor or midwife will give you specific instructions.
sentences.cn: 你的医生和助产士在这方面能够给你提供不少具体的指导.

words.tran_cn: 产科学，助产学；助产术；促成

trans.tran_en: a specially trained nurse whose job is to help women when they are having a baby
